fields.description: true if the account is enabled; otherwise, false. Required. Default is true.  Supports $filter (eq, ne, not, in). Only callers with at least the Cloud Device Administrator role can set this property.
fields.name: AccountEnabled

fields.description: For internal use only. Not nullable. Supports $filter (eq, not, ge, le).
fields.name: AlternativeSecurityIds

fields.description: The timestamp type represents date and time information using ISO 8601 format and is always in UTC time. For example, midnight UTC on Jan 1, 2014 is 2014-01-01T00:00:00Z. Read-only. Supports $filter (eq, ne, not, ge, le, and eq on null values) and $orderby.
fields.name: ApproximateLastSignInDateTime

fields.description: The timestamp when the device is no longer deemed compliant. The timestamp type represents date and time information using ISO 8601 format and is always in UTC time. For example, midnight UTC on Jan 1, 2014 is 2014-01-01T00:00:00Z. Read-only.
fields.name: ComplianceExpirationDateTime

fields.description: User-defined property set by Intune to automatically add devices to groups and simplify managing devices.
fields.name: DeviceCategory

fields.description: Unique identifier set by Azure Device Registration Service at the time of registration. This is an alternate key that can be used to reference the device object. Supports $filter (eq, ne, not, startsWith).
fields.name: DeviceId

fields.description: For internal use only. Set to null.
fields.name: DeviceMetadata

fields.description: Ownership of the device. This property is set by Intune. Possible values are: unknown, company, personal.
fields.name: DeviceOwnership

fields.description: For internal use only.
fields.name: DeviceVersion

fields.description: The display name for the device. Required. Supports $filter (eq, ne, not, ge, le, in, startsWith, and eq on null values), $search, and $orderby.
fields.name: DisplayName

fields.description: Enrollment profile applied to the device. For example, Apple Device Enrollment Profile, Device enrollment - Corporate device identifiers, or Windows Autopilot profile name. This property is set by Intune.
fields.name: EnrollmentProfileName

fields.description: Enrollment type of the device. This property is set by Intune. Possible values are: unknown, userEnrollment, deviceEnrollmentManager, appleBulkWithUser, appleBulkWithoutUser, windowsAzureADJoin, windowsBulkUserless, windowsAutoEnrollment, windowsBulkAzureDomainJoin, windowsCoManagement.
fields.name: EnrollmentType

fields.description: The collection of open extensions defined for the device. Read-only. Nullable.
fields.name: Extensions

fields.description: true if the device complies with Mobile Device Management (MDM) policies; otherwise, false. Read-only. This can only be updated by Intune for any device OS type or by an approved MDM app for Windows OS devices. Supports $filter (eq, ne, not).
fields.name: IsCompliant

fields.description: true if the device is managed by a Mobile Device Management (MDM) app; otherwise, false. This can only be updated by Intune for any device OS type or by an approved MDM app for Windows OS devices. Supports $filter (eq, ne, not).
fields.name: IsManaged

fields.description: true if the device is rooted or jail-broken. This property can only be updated by Intune.
fields.name: IsRooted

fields.description: The management channel of the device. This property is set by Intune. Possible values are: eas, mdm, easMdm, intuneClient, easIntuneClient, configurationManagerClient, configurationManagerClientMdm, configurationManagerClientMdmEas, unknown, jamf, googleCloudDevicePolicyController.
fields.name: ManagementType

fields.description: Manufacturer of the device. Read-only.
fields.name: Manufacturer

fields.description: Application identifier used to register device into MDM. Read-only. Supports $filter (eq, ne, not, startsWith).
fields.name: MdmAppId

fields.description: Groups and administrative units that this device is a member of. Read-only. Nullable. Supports $expand.
fields.name: MemberOf

fields.description: List of OData IDs for `MemberOf` to bind to this entity
fields.name: MemberOf_ODataBind

fields.description: Model of the device. Read-only.
fields.name: Model

fields.description: The last time at which the object was synced with the on-premises directory. The Timestamp type represents date and time information using ISO 8601 format and is always in UTC time. For example, midnight UTC on Jan 1, 2014 is 2014-01-01T00:00:00Z Read-only. Supports $filter (eq, ne, not, ge, le, in).
fields.name: OnPremisesLastSyncDateTime

fields.description: The on-premises security identifier (SID) for the user who was synchronized from on-premises to the cloud. Read-only. Returned only on $select. Supports $filter (eq).
fields.name: OnPremisesSecurityIdentifier

fields.description: true if this object is synced from an on-premises directory; false if this object was originally synced from an on-premises directory but is no longer synced; null if this object has never been synced from an on-premises directory (default). Read-only. Supports $filter (eq, ne, not, in, and eq on null values).
fields.name: OnPremisesSyncEnabled

fields.description: The type of operating system on the device. Required. Supports $filter (eq, ne, not, ge, le, startsWith, and eq on null values).
fields.name: OperatingSystem

fields.description: The version of the operating system on the device. Required. Supports $filter (eq, ne, not, ge, le, startsWith, and eq on null values).
fields.name: OperatingSystemVersion

fields.description: For internal use only. Not nullable. Supports $filter (eq, not, ge, le, startsWith,/$count eq 0, /$count ne 0).
fields.name: PhysicalIds

fields.description: The profile type of the device. Possible values: RegisteredDevice (default), SecureVM, Printer, Shared, IoT.
fields.name: ProfileType

fields.description: The user that cloud joined the device or registered their personal device. The registered owner is set at the time of registration. Read-only. Nullable. Supports $expand.
fields.name: RegisteredOwners

fields.description: List of OData IDs for `RegisteredOwners` to bind to this entity
fields.name: RegisteredOwners_ODataBind

fields.description: Collection of registered users of the device. For cloud joined devices and registered personal devices, registered users are set to the same value as registered owners at the time of registration. Read-only. Nullable. Supports $expand.
fields.name: RegisteredUsers

fields.description: List of OData IDs for `RegisteredUsers` to bind to this entity
fields.name: RegisteredUsers_ODataBind

fields.description: Date and time of when the device was registered. The timestamp type represents date and time information using ISO 8601 format and is always in UTC time. For example, midnight UTC on Jan 1, 2014 is 2014-01-01T00:00:00Z. Read-only.
fields.name: RegistrationDateTime

fields.description: List of labels applied to the device by the system. Supports $filter (/$count eq 0, /$count ne 0).
fields.name: SystemLabels

fields.description: Groups and administrative units that the device is a member of. This operation is transitive. Supports $expand.
fields.name: TransitiveMemberOf

fields.description: List of OData IDs for `TransitiveMemberOf` to bind to this entity
fields.name: TransitiveMemberOf_ODataBind

fields.description: Type of trust for the joined device. Read-only. Possible values:  Workplace (indicates bring your own personal devices), AzureAd (Cloud only joined devices), ServerAd (on-premises domain joined devices joined to Microsoft Entra ID). For more details, see Introduction to device management in Microsoft Entra ID.
fields.name: TrustType
